# Waybill App
Waybill processing service (module) written with Golang.

##Requirements
- Go 1.16

```shell
go get -u github.com/ivas1ly/waybill-app
```

##Tech Stack
- Golang
  - Fiber
  - GORM
  - Gqlgen
  - Zap
- PostgreSQL

##Features
- 1
- 2
